keyMoments.title: Crew Members' Secret Protected by Luffy
keyMoments.description: The Gorgon Sisters' deepest secret (their slave marks) is nearly exposed during the arena battle, but Luffy protects Sandersonia's back, safeguarding the lie that has protected the crew's reputation.
keyMoments.significance: This act of protection by an outsider earns Luffy the trust of the Kuja Pirates' leadership and sets the foundation for their future alliance.

keyMoments.title: The Sisters' View of Men Begins to Change
keyMoments.description: The Gorgon Sisters, all members of the Kuja Pirates leadership, begin to see men differently through Luffy's compassionate actions.
keyMoments.significance: Marks a shift in the Kuja Pirates' relationship with the outside world, particularly regarding their stance on men.
